decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: 001 Location/Block Plan, 002 Rev A Existing Site Plan, 004 Rev B Existing Ground Floor Plan, 005 Rev A Existing First Floor Plan, 006 Rev A Existing Second Floor Plan, 008 Rev A Existing Roof Plan, 009 Rev A Existing Front Elevation, 015 Rev A Existing Front Elevation Showing Boundary Wall, 010 Rev A Existing Side Elevation, 012 Rev A Existing Rear Elevation, 013 Rev A Existing Section A-A, 014 Rev A Existing Section B-B, 3302 Proposed Site Plan, 3304 Proposed Ground Floor Plan, 3305 Proposed First Floor Plan, 3306 Proposed Second Floor Plan, 3308 Proposed Roof Plan, 3309 Rev A Proposed Front Elevation, 3315 Proposed Front elevation Showing Boundary Wall, 3210 Rev A Proposed Side Elevation, 3212 Rev A Proposed Rear Elevation, 3214 Proposed Section A-A, 3113 Proposed Section B-B
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
| The proposed solar panels to the front elevation shall not protrude more than 0.2m from the pane of the existing roofslope.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).
| The proposed ^IN; on the side elevations shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).
description: Alteration to front garden and boundary wall,(following demolition of existing); Alteration of roof from hip to gable end and roof extension to rear (main) roof slope incorporating two Juliet balcony; and installation of one roof lights to front roof slope, and extension above garage
